name: Duj Tl
description:
A Visual Novel about a traveler whose vehicle suddenly breaks down.

Being in the middle of no-where, he is in luck to find a repair shop nearby.
Only to find that there might be a language barrier between him and a fixed ship...

The task is simple:
Get your ship repaired and try to keep it as cheap as possible.
And lucky for you that you own a klingon sign chart, a dictionary and hopefully some determination!
